Welcome to the planning outputs of the satRday proposal!

SatRdays are free/cheap conferences focused on R and organised by the local R community. They're aimed at making R knowledge accessible, growing the R user base, and developing more speakers on R.

```{r fig.width=2, fig.height=2,echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(png)
library(grid)
img <- readPNG("satRdayLogo.png")
 grid.raster(img)
```
